name: Finish 5 holes while getting a red bar every shot, except putts, no GiveUp
150.0 points without multipliers above 5.0 (Driver Challenge / Target Shooter) (Driver Challenge / Target Shooter)
Land in 4 unique patches of deep rough on Hole L5 before finishing, no GiveUp
Cover the 4 and 20 space  (Chip-In Bingo / Bingo Clubber)
Finish any course without adjusting aim, no GiveUp
Finish 5 consecutive holes with the same amount of strokes
Hit 5 different tree trunks on any hole before finishing, no GiveUp
50.0 points without multipliers (Driver Challenge / Target Shooter)
Land in 3 unique bodies of water on one hole before finishing, no GiveUp
Sink 3 balls in a row without adjusting aim (Pro Putter / Putter Madness)
Hit a metal bar twice (Driver Challenge / Target Shooter)
Land on fairway, rough, deep rough, fringe and green on one hole, no GiveUp
